text: Az in ki islom ovardaand, (inho a'roʙiho) ʙar tu ej Rasul minnat mekunand. Bigu ʙarojason: «Ba xotiri islomaton ʙar man minnat maguzored, caro ki naf'i imon ʙa xudi on inson ʙarmegardad, ʙalki Alloh ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki sumoro ʙa imon roh namudaast, ʙar sumo minnat menihad, agar dar iddi'oi imonaton rost va durust hasted!»
